mapper.sql: id, title, content, start_time, end_time, mode, host_id, recorder_id, status, note, room_id
mapper.select: select m.id id ,m.title title,content, m.start_time start_time, m.end_time end_time, m.status status, m.room_id room_id,m.host_id, mode,host_id,recorder_id,note, h.user_name hostName, r.user_name recorderName,mr.name roomName from t_meeting m, t_meeting_room mr,t_user h,t_user r where m.room_id=mr.id and h.user_id = m.host_id and r.user_id = m.recorder_id

select m.id id ,m.title title,content, m.start_time start_time, m.end_time end_time, m.status status,m.host_id, m.room_id room_id, mode,host_id,recorder_id,note, h.user_name hostName, r.user_name recorderName,mr.name roomName from t_meeting m, t_meeting_room mr,t_user h,t_user r where m.room_id=mr.id and h.user_id = m.host_id and r.user_id = m.recorder_id and m.id= #{meetingId}

select m.id , m.title title , m.start_time startTime , m.end_time endTime, m.status status,m.note note, m.mode mode, u.user_name attendeeName, r.user_name recoderName ,h.user_name hostName,m.host_id from t_meeting_attendees ma inner join t_user u on ma.user_id =u.user_id inner join t_meeting m on m.id = ma.meeting_id inner join t_user r on m.recorder_id = r.user_id inner join t_user h on m.host_id = h.user_id where m.status = #{currentMeetingStatus} and ma.user_id = #{currentUserId}

select m.id , m.title title , m.start_time startTime , m.end_time endTime, m.status status,m.note note,m.mode mode,m.host_id, h.user_name hostName from t_meeting m inner join t_user h on m.host_id = h.user_id where m.status like concat('%',#{currentMeetingStatus}) and m.host_id = #{currentUserId}

select m.id , m.title title , m.start_time startTime , m.end_time endTime, m.status status,m.note note,m.mode mode,m.host_id, r.user_name recoderName ,h.user_name hostName from t_meeting m inner join t_user r on m.recorder_id = r.user_id inner join t_user h on m.host_id = h.user_id where m.status like concat('%',#{tempStatus}) and m.host_id = #{currentUserId} and m.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')

select m.id , m.title title , m.start_time startTime , m.end_time endTime, m.status status,m.note note,m.mode mode, u.user_name attendeeName, r.user_name recoderName ,h.user_name hostName,m.host_id from t_meeting_attendees ma inner join t_user u on ma.user_id =u.user_id inner join t_meeting m on m.id = ma.meeting_id inner join t_user r on m.recorder_id = r.user_id inner join t_user h on m.host_id = h.user_id where m.status = #{satus} and ma.user_id = #{currentUserId} and m.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
